features: ✔ GENUINE LEATHER – This leather sling bag made from 100% genuine hand-crafted retro leather for soft and comfortable. Leather surface give user breathing touch.The lining was made of polyester, smooth and durable.

✔ PERFECT SIZE - Dimension:6.8"x13"x3.5"(LxHxW), about 0.85 lbs, strap length: 51". This chest bag is a mini backpack, but it is a perfect size for taking to a day trip or shopping.And the crossbody bag has a adjustable shoulder strap up to 51".for long or short,easy to adjust.

✔ EXCELLENT DESIGN & STYLISH - We wanted to make the casual daypack practical enough but at the same time very trendy,3 hierarchic pocket and a buckle pocket with a hole for earphone wire. This vintage leather backpack is perfect for the stylish traditionalist with a taste for unique luxury and high quality craftsmanship.

✔ MULTI FUNCTION – Designed for multi purpose sling bag, can be used a casual sports sling bag, messenger bag, handbag, cross body bag, business bag, chest bag, shoulder bag,backpack, travel bag, golf bag, walking bag, purse backpack. For most occasion like cycling, riding, running, climbing, camping, hiking, shopping, walking, outing, travel, vacation, trip daily using.

✔ IDEAL GIFT – This leather chest bag is a great gift idea.Whenever you have a gift selectivity problem for men or women.This shoulder bag should be a best choice for you.a noble and practical present for you.
body.description: QUALITY WARRANTY & MONEY BACK GUARANTEE What we provide is not only better product, but also best service. If there are any issues, we'll give you a full refund or replacement.No questions asked. We just want your 100% satisfaction instead of 99%. Fed up with the old over-sized backpack, that tire your trip? It is not as large as a backbag, but which you can put your sunglass,wallet,water bottle,Mini iPad,phone,headphone, camera,MP3,keys,books,and all both your daily items. I'd like to give you some suggestions here: It is great on the go, right size for day trips, not a very big bag but sufficient enough to carry your every day gadgetry. You can put cell phone, keys, pens, sunglasses, cell phone , jewelry, lipstick, watch, Mini ipad or something small but valuable in the shoulder bag, not suitable for laptops. If you still has no concept of the size, needn't be hesitated, becuase you got 30 days to return it and get full payment back. Great for both indoor and outdoor use including business, hiking, travel, camping,biking, sporting events,etc. Just right for keeping your essential belongings close and safe. It can be used as a Chest Pack, Business Leather Bag, Casual Sports Sling Bag, Single Shoulder Bags, Everyday Backpack, Messenger Bag, Travel bag. Product Feature: Material:100% genuine cowhide leather Size:6.8"x13"x3.5"(LxHxW) Net weight:about 0.85 lbs Strap length:51" Package included:1 * men sling bag

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Purchased for my husband so when we go on vacation I don’t have to haul his belongings in my pocketbook. Now he can have his passport, wallet, phone and everything else he needs at his disposal and in front of him .While in the Bahamas we got out of a cab to discover his phone fell out of his pocket into the seat of the cab . Took us all day and night to track down the driver, hopefully this pouch will help him keep up with his phone the next time lol .All-in-all the quality is good ( not the highest quality of Leather but looks nice ) . Very light and he said it’s comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great travel bag for men
reviews.reviewText: If you are looking for a great travel bag for a man, this is the one. The cross-body bag is durable, with an adjustable strap. Perfect size and style with compartments for a wallet and personnel items. This bag comes in several colors, and it is made of real durable leather. The style can be used by anyone looking for a durable crossbody bag it is an excellent travel must have.Highly recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great over the shoulder bag
reviews.reviewText: Bought for my Dad. He loved it. He is tall and it looks great on him. Adjustable strap highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Smallish but big enough for minitablet, phone, extra wallet, passport. The major flaw (if it matters) is that the steel rimmed opening for lookthe charging cable is too small for a USB C cable to pass through which renders that function useless. Not even close. Other than that, it's a nice functional bag.

reviews.reviewerName: Jerry D McMillian I IJerry D McMillian I I
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great bag, great quality. More than enough room to carry everything you may need. Highly recommended. 😁

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love it.
reviews.reviewText: The bag is exactly what I wanted. What's more, it's received a few compliments. The quality, look, and performance - so far - is spot on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Durable and Functional
reviews.reviewText: This product was a Xmas gift to my husband and he loved it. I wanted a leather item since his last one did not hold up well and needed something with more pockets. Thanks for the product and making it on time for Xmas. It placed a smile on my hubby!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent for men
reviews.reviewText: This is a great product for men to carry cell phones, medicine, documents and many other items they may need to carry. Handsomely made. Brought it for my husband.
